---
title: "Jack Hartman"
---

<hr> 

```{r Master, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.align = "center", fig.width = 4, fig.height = 4, comment = NA, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
Master <- read_csv("Master.csv")
Pitcher <- Master %>%
  filter(Pitcher == "Hartman, Jack")
x <- c(-.95,.95,.95,-.95,-.95)
z <- c(1.6,1.6,3.5,3.5,1.6)
sz <- data_frame(x, z)
```

```{r RightHandedBatter}
FastballsThrownR <- Pitcher %>%
  filter(TaggedPitchType == "Fastball" & BatterSide == "Right" & !PitchCall == "Undefined")
ggplot() +
  geom_path(data = sz, aes(x = x, y = z)) +
  coord_equal() +
  xlab("Plate Width") +
  ylab("Plate Height") +
  ggtitle(" Fastballs to Right Handed Batter") +
  geom_point(data = FastballsThrownR,aes(x = PlateLocSide, y = PlateLocHeight, color = PitchCall)) +
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(-2, 2), ylim = c(0, 5)) +
  scale_color_discrete(limits = c("StrikeSwinging" ,"StrikeCalled", "BallCalled", "HitByPitch", "InPlay", "FoulBall"))
```

```{r LeftHandedBatter}
FastballsThrownL <- Pitcher %>%

ggplot() +
```
